original_text: And it came to pass on the morrow, when the Philistines came to strip the slain, that they found Saul and his sons fallen in mount Gilboa.
korean_text: 이튿날에 블레셋 사람들이 와서 죽임을 당한 자의 옷을 벗기다가 사울과 그의 아들들이 길보아 산에 엎드러졌음을 보고

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass on the morrow
when the Philistines came to strip the slain
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 죽은 자들을 벗기려고 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: that they found Saul and his sons
